verses.1: David le nasepna ah a ukpite in zong laiza lasaknate, harp lasaknate le daltuahte tawh Pasian thu a gen dingin Asaf, Heman le Jeduthun-teʼ tapate pawl khat nasepna a dingin koihtuam uh hi. Na a semte le amauʼ nasepte:
verses.2: Asafʼ tapate sung panin: Kumpipaʼ makaihna nuai ah Pasianʼ thu a gen Asafʼ makaihna nuai ah Asafʼ tapate Zakkur, Josef, Nethaniah le Asharelah ahi hi.
verses.3: Jeduthunʼ sung panin Jeduthunʼ tapate: Lungdamkohna le Topa phatna-in laiza lasakna tawh thu a gen, a pa uh Jeduthunʼ makaihna nuai ah Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah le Mattithiah, guk pha uh hi.
verses.4: Heman sung panin Hemanʼ tapate: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir le Mahazioth ahi hi.
verses.5: Hihte khempeuh pen Pasian thuciamna bangin amah a pahtawi dingin kumpipaʼ thumu pa Hemanʼ tapate ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Heman tungah tapa sawm le li le tanu thum pia hi.
verses.6: Amaute khempeuh Pasianʼ biakinn nasep nadingin Topaʼ biakinn sungah daltuahte, harp lasaknate le laiza lasaknate tawh la lamsang ah a pa uh ukna nuai ah om uh hi. Asaf, Jeduthun le Heman-te pen kumpipaʼ thupiakna nuai ah om uh hi.
verses.7: A Levi mipihte uh tawh Topa ading lasakna lamah sinna a nei a siam mi a vekpi-in za nih le sawm giat le giat ahi hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin a neu a lian, sia le a sinte a kibangin, amaute in amauʼ nasep ding uh ai a san uh hi.
verses.9: Asafʼ behte adingin ai masa Josef tungah tu hi. A nihna Gedaliah, a sanggamte le a tapate, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.10: A thumna Zakkur, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.11: A lina Izri, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.12: A ngana Nethaniah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.13: A gukna Bukkiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.14: A sagihna Jesharelah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.15: A giatna Jeshaiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.16: A kuana Mattaniah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.17: A sawmna Shimei, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.18: A sawm le khatna Azarel, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.19: A sawm le nihna Hashabiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.20: A sawm le thumna Shubael, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.21: A sawm le lina Mattithiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.22: A sawm le ngana Jeremoth, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.23: A sawm le gukna Hananiah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.24: A sawm le sagihna Joshbekashah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.25: A sawm le giatna Hanani, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.26: A sawm le kuana Mallothi, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.27: A sawm nihna Eliathah, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.28: A sawm nih le khatna Hothir, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.29: A sawm nih le nihna Giddalti, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.30: A sawm nih le thumna Mahazioth, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung tu hi.
verses.31: A sawm nih le lina Romamti-ezer, a tapate le a sanggamte, sawm le nih tung a tu hi.
